title: UAE ambassador meets education minister
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 07 (APP): Ambassador of United Arab Emirates (UAE) to Pakistan Hamad Obaid Alzaabi called on Federal Minister for Education, Professional Training & National Heritage Shafqat Mahmood here on Wednesday in his office.
During the course of meeting, both sides discussed the various aspects of bilateral relationship and pledged to further cement them between both states.
Both the dignitaries discussed ways to strengthen cooperation in the realm of education, culture and skill development.
Shafqat Mahmood said that UAE is the home to the second largest Pakistani Community abroad, adding that they are contributing significantly to progress of both countries.
Hamad Obaid Alzaabi, Ambassador of United Arab Emirates (UAE) appreciated the vision of Prime Minister Imran Khan and Shafqat Mahmood for the development and betterment of the education sector in Pakistan.
